H347.def: = man; ◄ from the land of {L:Uz<SDBH:עוּץ>}; ► main character of book of Job

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H6030.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H551.def: = marker expressing a speaker's confirmation of the truth of a statement; in some cases the truth of this statement is conceded

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H6275.def: = process by which rocks move spontaneously from one place to another

H7264.def: = process by which humans or objects shake involuntarily; ◄ typically as a result of fear, insecurity, shock, excitement, or other emotions

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H5982.def: = a tall, vertical structure ◄ made of metal, stone, or wood ► and used as support for a building or for decoration

H2224.def: = process by which the sun appears in the morning to provide light and warmth to the world; ≈ associated with a new period of well-being

H1157.def: = path through which a certain entity can be accessed, which can vary from a relatively narrow opening on one side to the entire surrounding space

H2856.def: = to put a seal on a written document; ► in order to confirm that the document is authentic and to keep unauthorized readers from having access to it; ≈ associated with both authenticity and secrecy

H3556.def: = celestial body, providing light, and assisting the sun and moon in ruling day and night; ◄ created and controled by the divine; ≈ associated with a high and elevated position and sometimes personified as creatures that can sing and wage war

H905.def: = woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of clothes; worn by priests and supernatural beings; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness

H5186.def: = state in which a relatively straight object is shaped into a curve

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H1869.def: = action by which humans or animals move forward by lifting and setting down each foot in turn

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H3598.def: = group of bright stars, often identified with the Pleiades, a cluster of bright stars in the constellation of Taurus

H2907.def: = action by which a bird of prey descends quickly through the air, with closed wings ► to capture an animal

H7950.def: = frozen crystallized water vapor in the form of very white flakes which fall as precipitation from the sky and cover the ground during freezing cold weather; as soon as the temperature rises above freezing, it melts and becomes water; ≈ associated with cold, whiteness, or purity

H2141.def: = state in which an object is without any outward form of physical contamination

H3709.def: = the inner part of the human {L:hand<SDBH:יָד>}, but with special focus on the activities performed with it, such as holding, covering, or lifting objects, leaning on a staff, clapping, etc.

H1253.def: = state in which something is free of dirt or things that are regarded as pollutants; ≈ often used figuratively to describe being free of guilt

H227.def: = referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future

H2881.def: = action by which part or all of an object is put into a liquid briefly and, in most cases, soon removed; ► often to absorb some of the liquid and apply it elsewhere

H8008.def: = a long, flowing outer garment reaching to the feet; it was generally a loose-fitting cloth that was draped around the body and held in place in the middle by a sash wrapped around the waist or some means of fastening such as pins or buttons; it was worn at all levels of society, including also priests and other religious leaders; it served more purposes than just an outer covering; women sometimes carried bowls or other implements or grain in its folds; for poorer people it also served as a covering when sleeping

H3644.def: = fire; ≈ associated with God's punishment, which is too heavy for humans to bear

H996.def: = the area separating two or mores locations

H7896.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H367.def: = state of strong fear because of an actual or perceived danger, such as aggression from the enemy, a dangerous animal, or death

H1204.def: = causative process by which a creature or object causes someone else to be in deep distress

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else
